00088 typedef enum {
00089   icCmmStatBad                = -1,
00090   icCmmStatOk                 = 0,
00091   icCmmStatCantOpenProfile    = 1,
00092   icCmmStatBadSpaceLink       = 2,
00093   icCmmStatInvalidProfile     = 3,
00094   icCmmStatBadXform           = 4,
00095   icCmmStatInvalidLut         = 5,
00096   icCmmStatProfileMissingTag  = 6,

00098   icCmmStatIncorrectApply     = 8,
00099   icCmmStatBadColorEncoding   = 9,
00100   icCmmStatAllocErr           = 10,
00101   icCmmStatBadLutType         = 11,
00102 } icStatusCMM;

00127 typedef enum {

00129   icXformType3DLut      = 1,

00131   icXformTypeNDLut      = 3,

00134         icXformTypeMonochrome = 6,
00135 
00136   icXformTypeUnknown    = 0x7ffffff,
00137 } icXformType;

00161 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccCreateXformHintManager
00162 {
00163 public:

00165         ~CIccCreateXformHintManager();
00166 
00168         bool AddHint(IIccCreateXformHint* pHint);
00169 
00171         bool DeleteHint(IIccCreateXformHint* pHint);
00172 
00174         IIccCreateXformHint* GetHint(const char* hintName);
00175 
00176 private:
00177         // private hint ptr class
00178         class IIccCreateXformHintPtr {
00179         public:
00180                 IIccCreateXformHint* ptr;
00181         };
00182         typedef std::list<IIccCreateXformHintPtr> IIccCreateXformHintList;
00183 
00184         // private members
00185         IIccCreateXformHintList* m_pList;
00186 };

00251 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXform
00252 {
00253 public:
00254   CIccXform();
00255   virtual ~CIccXform();
00256 
00257   virtual icXformType GetXformType() const = 0;
00258 
00260   static CIccXform *Create(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput=true, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent, 
00261                            icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
00262                            bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00263 
00266   static CIccXform *Create(CIccProfile &pProfile, bool bInput=true, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent, 
00267                            icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
00268                            bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00269 
00270   virtual icStatusCMM Begin();
00271 
00272   virtual CIccApplyXform *GetNewApply(icStatusCMM &status);
00273 
00274   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyXform *pXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const = 0;
00275 
00276   //Detach and remove CIccIO object associated with xform's profile.  Must call after Begin()
00277   virtual bool RemoveIO() { return m_pProfile->Detach(); }
00278 
00280   virtual icColorSpaceSignature GetSrcSpace() const;
00281 
00283   virtual icColorSpaceSignature GetDstSpace() const;
00284 
00286   virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return false; }
00288   virtual bool IsVersion2() const { return !m_pProfile || m_pProfile->m_Header.version < icVersionNumberV4; }
00289 
00291   bool IsInput() const { return m_bInput; }
00292 
00294   void SetParams(CIccProfile *pProfile, bool bInput, icRenderingIntent nIntent, icXformInterp nInterp, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00295 
00297   virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractInputCurves()=0;
00298   virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractOutputCurves()=0;
00299 
00300   virtual bool NoClipPCS() const { return false; }
00301 
00303         const CIccProfile* GetProfile() const { return m_pProfile; }
00304 
00306         icRenderingIntent GetIntent() const { return m_nIntent; }
00307 
00309   icXformInterp GetInterp() const { return m_nInterp; }
00310 
00311 protected:
00312   //Called by derived classes to initialize Base
00313 
00314   const icFloatNumber *CheckSrcAbs(CIccApplyXform *pApply, const icFloatNumber *Pixel) const;
00315   void CheckDstAbs(icFloatNumber *Pixel) const;
00316         void AdjustPCS(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const;
00317 
00318   virtual bool HasPerceptualHandling() { return true; }
00319 
00320   CIccProfile *m_pProfile;
00321   bool m_bInput;
00322   icRenderingIntent m_nIntent;
00323   icXYZNumber m_MediaXYZ;
00324   icXformInterp m_nInterp;
00325 
00326         // track PCS adjustments
00327         IIccAdjustPCSXform* m_pAdjustPCS;
00328         bool m_bAdjustPCS;
00329         icFloatNumber m_PCSScale[3]; // scale and offset for PCS adjustment in XYZ
00330         icFloatNumber m_PCSOffset[3];
00331 };

00363 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccApplyXform
00364 {
00365   friend class CIccXform;
00366 public:
00367   virtual ~CIccApplyXform();
00368   virtual icXformType GetXformType() const { return icXformTypeUnknown; }
00369 
00370   void __inline Apply(icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) { m_pXform->Apply(this, DstPixel, SrcPixel); }
00371 
00372   const CIccXform *GetXform() { return m_pXform; }
00373 
00374 protected:
00375   icFloatNumber m_AbsLab[3];
00376 
00377   CIccApplyXform(CIccXform *pXform);
00378 
00379   const CIccXform *m_pXform;
00380 };

00608 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXformNamedColor : public CIccXform
00609 {
00610 public:
00611   CIccXformNamedColor(CIccTag *pTag, icColorSpaceSignature csPCS, icColorSpaceSignature csDevice);
00612   virtual ~CIccXformNamedColor();
00613 
00614   virtual icXformType GetXformType() const { return icXformTypeNamedColor; }
00615 
00616   virtual icStatusCMM Begin();
00617 
00619   icApplyInterface GetInterface() const {return m_nApplyInterface;}
00620 
00621   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const {} 
00622 
00623   icStatusCMM Apply(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform, icChar *DstColorName, const icFloatNumber *SrcPixel) const;
00624   icStatusCMM Apply(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform, icFloatNumber *DstPixel, const icChar *SrcColorName) const;
00625 
00626   virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return m_pTag->UseLegacyPCS(); }
00627 
00628   icStatusCMM SetSrcSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace);
00629   icStatusCMM SetDestSpace(icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace);
00630 
00632   icColorSpaceSignature GetSrcSpace() const { return m_nSrcSpace; }
00634   icColorSpaceSignature GetDstSpace() const { return m_nDestSpace; }
00635 
00637   bool IsSrcPCS() const {return m_nSrcSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();}
00639   bool IsDestPCS() const {return m_nDestSpace == m_pTag->GetPCS();}
00640 
00641 
00642   virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractInputCurves() {return NULL;}
00643   virtual LPIccCurve* ExtractOutputCurves() {return NULL;}
00644 
00645 protected:
00646 
00647   virtual bool HasPerceptualHandling() { return false; }
00648 
00649   CIccTagNamedColor2 *m_pTag;
00650   icApplyInterface m_nApplyInterface;
00651   icColorSpaceSignature m_nSrcSpace;
00652   icColorSpaceSignature m_nDestSpace;
00653 };

00731   void CheckLast(icFloatNumber *SrcPixel, icColorSpaceSignature Space, bool bNoClip=false);
00732 
00733   static void LabToXyz(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip=false);
00734   static void XyzToLab(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip=false);
00735   static void Lab2ToXyz(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip=false);
00736   static void XyzToLab2(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoClip=false);
00737   static icFloatNumber NegClip(icFloatNumber v);
00738   static icFloatNumber UnitClip(icFloatNumber v);
00739 
00740   static void Lab2ToLab4(icFloatNumber *Dst, const icFloatNumber *Src, bool bNoclip=false);

00742 protected:
00743

00824   void AppendApplyXform(CIccApplyXform *pApplyXform);

00846 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccCmm 
00847 {
00848   friend class CIccApplyCmm;
00849 public:
00850   CIccCmm(icColorSpaceSignature nSrcSpace=icSigUnknownData,
00851           icColorSpaceSignature nDestSpace=icSigUnknownData,
00852           bool bFirstInput=true);
00853   virtual ~CIccCmm();
00854 
00855   virtual CIccPCS *GetPCS() { return new CIccPCS(); }
00856 
00858   virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(const icChar *szProfilePath, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
00859                                icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
00860                                bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00861   virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(icUInt8Number *pProfileMem, icUInt32Number nProfileLen,
00862                                icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent, icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear,
00863                                icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor, bool bUseMpeTags=true,
00864                                CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00865   virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(CIccProfile *pProfile, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
00866                                icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
00867                                bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);  //Note: profile will be owned by the CMM
00868   virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(CIccProfile &Profile, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
00869                                icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
00870                                bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);  //Note the profile will be copied
00871 
00872   //The Begin function should be called before Apply or GetNewApplyCmm()
00873   virtual icStatusCMM Begin(bool bAllocNewApply=true);
00874 
00875   //Get an additional Apply cmm object to apply pixels with.  The Apply object should be deleted by the caller.

00877

01099 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccMruCmm : public CIccCmm
01100 {
01101   friend class CIccApplyMruCmm;
01102 private:
01103   CIccMruCmm();
01104 public:
01105   virtual ~CIccMruCmm();
01106 
01107   //This is the function used to create a new CIccMruCmm.  The pCmm must be valid and its Begin() already called.
01108   static CIccMruCmm* Attach(CIccCmm *pCmm, icUInt8Number nCacheSize=6);  //The returned object will own pCmm, and pCmm is deleted on failure.
01109

01111   virtual icStatusCMM AddXform(const icChar *szProfilePath, icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent,
01112     icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
01113     bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL) { return icCmmStatBad; }

01115     icRenderingIntent nIntent=icUnknownIntent, icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear,

01118     icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
01119     bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL)  { return icCmmStatBad; }

01121     icXformInterp nInterp=icInterpLinear, icXformLutType nLutType=icXformLutColor,
01122     bool bUseMpeTags=true, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL) { return icCmmStatBad; }
01123 
01124   virtual CIccApplyCmm *GetNewApplyCmm(icStatusCMM &status); 
01125 
01126   //Forward calls to attached CMM
